console.texto: Graduated in Systems Analysis and Development from Fatene since 2017 and specialized in Fullstack programming from Labenu. Since 2021, I have been building REST APIs on the Backend with a focus on Node.JS, TypeScript, Express.JS, Knex.JS and PostgreSQL, as well as using React.JS on the Frontend. In my last contract I also had experience with tools such as: Datadog, Kibana Elastic and Google Cloud Platform. My professional ambition is to advance my career as a Backend and Frontend Developer.

projetos.descCard1: An application that accurately calculates the amount that must be charged on the Mercado Pago machine, if the customer wants to pay in installments for a purchase on credit.

trabalhos.detalheCard1: I studied Systems Analysis and Development at the Faculty of Technology of the Northeast (Fatene)
trabalhos.detalheCard3: I worked at Hapvida Notre Dame.
trabalhos.detalheCard4: I worked at Ame Digital, a company in the Americanas group (B2W).
trabalhos.detalheCard5: I work as a Freelance Fullstack Web Programmer.
